title: GRANDMOTHER’S DUTCH STOVE
content: Grandmother has a large stove. It is not at all like our stoves. Our stoves are made of iron and are black. Grandmother’s Dutch stove is white. It is made of white porcelain. There are pretty colored pictures on grandmother’s stove. Jan and Katrina like to go to grandmother’s on a cold day and sit before her pretty stove. They take off their wooden shoes and get their toes warm. Grandmother sits beside the stove, too. She tells them pretty stories about the pictures on her stove.
